books.author: by Elin Hilderbrand
books.description: The Levin family undergoes dramatic events with a son in Vietnam, a daughter in protests and dark secrets hiding beneath the surface.
books.name: SUMMER OF '69

books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A decorated World War II veteran shoots and kills a pastor inside a Mississippi church.
books.name: THE RECKONING

books.author: by Elizabeth Gilbert
books.description: An 89-year-old Vivian Morris looks back at the direction her life took when she entered the 1940s New York theater scene.
books.name: CITY OF GIRLS

books.author: by Jennifer Weiner
books.description: The story of two sisters, Jo and Bethie Kaufman, and their life experiences as the world around them changes drastically from the 1950s.
books.name: MRS. EVERYTHING

books.author: by Lisa Wingate
books.description: A South Carolina lawyer learns about the questionable practices of a Tennessee orphanage.
books.name: BEFORE WE WERE YOURS

books.author: by James Patterson and David Ellis
books.description: A string of seemingly accidental and unrelated deaths confound F.B.I. agent Emmy Dockery.
books.name: UNSOLVED

books.author: by Celeste Ng
books.description: An artist upends a quiet town outside Cleveland.
books.name: LITTLE FIRES EVERYWHERE

books.author: by Heather Morris
books.description: A concentration camp detainee tasked with permanently marking fellow prisoners falls in love with one of them.
books.name: THE TATTOOIST OF AUSCHWITZ

books.author: by Neil Gaiman and Terry Pratchett
books.description: Aziraphale, an angel and rare-book dealer, and his demon friend Crowley try to circumvent the end of the world.
books.name: GOOD OMENS

books.author: by Mike Maden
books.description: Jack Ryan Jr.’s latest adventures take him on a mission to stop an international criminal conspiracy and deal with tragic news.
books.name: TOM CLANCY: ENEMY CONTACT

books.author: by Clive Cussler and Robin Burcell
books.description: Treasure-hunting couple, Sam and Remi Fargo, embark on a new adventure to find a sacred ancient scroll and lift its curse.
books.name: THE ORACLE

books.author: by Debbie Macomber
books.description: Annie Marlow forms new relationships in the Pacific Northwest as she tries to recover from tragedy.
books.name: COTTAGE BY THE SEA

books.author: by Bella Andre
books.description: Rory Sullivan and Zara Mirren go to her ex’s engagement party as a fake couple even though they cannot stand each other.
books.name: THERE GOES MY HEART

books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: Jack Reacher explores the New England town where his father was born and a Canadian couple now find themselves stranded.
books.name: PAST TENSE
